name: Blitz Bots
description: Blitz is a versatile decentralized tool designed for users on Telegram, offering a range of functionalities to enhance the crypto experience. Its primary purpose is to empower users with tools for wallet tracking, PNL scanning for alpha wallet identification, and seamless copy trading through an exclusive sniper feature. The project's core focus is speed, achieved through professional development utilizing tools like Bribe, Rsyncbuilder, and specialized routing. Blitz aims to redefine transaction efficiency in the cryptocurrency realm by providing users with swift and reliable solutions for their trading needs.
